column4: I don't get the Guided Resize and Use freed space option while installing ubuntu, what is wrong?

i got the same error when i did it, I don't really know why it does it sometimes and sometimes not... its like the first time i tried it it gave it to me, then I went back and tried again and it didn't give it to me, then i got an error and it gave it to me again
my suggestion is that you do it without the guided thing, don't continue after that, hit the back and see if it lets you do it the second time around
I did try back a few times, but never see the resize option
